review: Got this for my mother to stream from her Chromebook to her TV. So easy to use for streaming Netflix or YouTube from most any device, but I highly recommend it to anyone who uses a Chromebook. My mother enjoys looking at Facebook photos, etc streamed to the big screen TV so she can see them better. Just a great bargain for what you get!

review: Google should be ashamed.  Google boasts that this device is compatible with Android phones and tablets, it is not except for a few models.  You cannot even cast video from the Google Chrome browser on an Android device. Google's own browser on an operating system they control cannot be used to control this device.  Go figure.When I control this unit from my PC (Chrome browser) the video is very choppy and unreliable.  I'm sticking with the Amazon Fire TV Stick which has been FLAWLESS since purchased.
